postPublish: env BUNDLE_URL_PREFIX='https://u.expo.dev/$EAS_PROJECT_ID/' CODE_VERSION=$EAS_BUILD_ID SOURCEMAP_PATH=./dist/index.android.bundle.map BUNDLE_PATH=./dist/index.android.bundle npm run upload-sourcemaps
env BUNDLE_URL_PREFIX='https://u.expo.dev/$EAS_PROJECT_ID/' CODE_VERSION=$EAS_BUILD_ID SOURCEMAP_PATH=./dist/main.jsbundle.map BUNDLE_PATH=./dist/main.jsbundle npm run upload-sourcemaps
postBuild: env BUNDLE_URL_PREFIX='bundle://' CODE_VERSION=$EAS_BUILD_ID SOURCEMAP_PATH=./dist/index.android.bundle.map BUNDLE_PATH=./dist/index.android.bundle npm run upload-sourcemaps
env BUNDLE_URL_PREFIX='bundle://' CODE_VERSION=$EAS_BUILD_ID SOURCEMAP_PATH=./dist/main.jsbundle.map BUNDLE_PATH=./dist/main.jsbundle npm run upload-sourcemaps
